706772f-a.text:
Shore Road, at the N.E. corner of Bay Ridge P'kway.
June S, 1931.

706773f-a.title: Brooklyn: Shore Road - 75th Street
706773f-a.text:
(1)
Shore Road, east side, between 76th and 75th Streets. G.T. Bergen
house (No. 7515), is the house in the foreground.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED2
(2)
The same, showing a front view of house in the foreground of view No. 1.
June 5, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
